name: Create a WooCommerce customer from a Gravity Forms form submission
description:
Use this template to automatically create a WooCommerce customer (provided it doesn't already exist) from a new Gravity Forms form submission.

Your Gravity Forms form has to include an 'Email' field (fields that are not required but you can include them are: First name, Last name, both billing and shipping Street address, City, Postal code, State/province, Country, Phone, Company).
